code_snippet:
from subprocess import call, PIPE, Popen
import sys

class BuildMan(Command):
    """Builds the man page using sphinx"""
    user_options = []

    def run(self):
        cmd = "sphinx-build -b man docs man"
        sphinx_proc = Popen(cmd.split(),
                            stdout=PIPE,
                            stderr=PIPE)
        stdout, stderr = sphinx_proc.communicate()
        return_code = sphinx_proc.wait()
        if return_code:
            print("Warning: Build of manpage failed \"%s\":\n%s\n%s" % (
                      cmd,
                      stdout,
                      stderr))
    def initialize_options(self):
        pass

    def finalize_options(self):
        pass

mapped_sequence.description: Spawns new process to execute command without shell access
Reads all bytes from process standard output
Waits for process to complete execution
